title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 651.20 - Approval of discontinuance of operation or disposal of sewage treatment works
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 651.20 - Approval of discontinuance of operation or disposal of sewage treatment works

State Regulations
(a) The
recipient of a grant pursuant to section 1263-b of the Public Health Law shall
not discontinue operation or dispose of a sewage treatment works until an
application to do so has been approved by the commissioner. (b) Such an application will not be granted
by the commissioner unless he is satisfied that such discontinuance or disposal
will not result in new or additional pollution of waters of the State. The
commissioner may, in his discretion, conduct or cause to be conducted a hearing
in connection with his consideration of such an application. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6

651.20

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
